Well. Let's summarize!
Objects for hunting are living in the Icy depths of the Labyrinth Buffalo Labyrinth, Frozen Buffalo, the Cubs Ursus, Ursus, Bigfoot Maze and Frosty Yeti. Start the hunt for these creatures and get Buffalo Meat, Meat Ursus and Yeti Meat. Yes, for 30 pieces of meat each. All this take it to a lock Suchart captain Vysotskogo. To complete the task You ought to go to the Ice Maze. You all understand? Hooray for the lot!
